title: Machine Keyword
description: The `Machine Keyword` schema is used to track machine-assigned descriptive phrases like keywords or tags of an asset with specific confidence and locale. For human-defined keywords, use the `keywords` property.

xdm:confidence.description: Confidence of the algorithm that this keyword is applicable to the asset. Confidence values are numbers between zero and one. A value of .95 indicates that the algorithm expects less than 5% of all tags with the same confidence value to be mis-applied, i.e. not to be a proper description of the asset.

xdm:algorithm.description: Name of the algorithm which generated the keyword.

xdm:value.description: The keyword itself. A keyword can be considered like a tag, i.e. a short description of the content of the asset.

xdm:localeCode.description: Language of the keyword. The locale code should follow [RFC BCP47](https://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)
